meanings.definition: A parasitic disease caused by roundworms of the genus Trichinella.
meanings.sent1: Trichinoses can be prevented by thoroughly cooking pork.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with trichinoses after examining the symptoms.
meanings.sent3: The trichinoses in the pig made it the least popular animal on the farm.
meanings.sent4: The spread of trichinoses in the community was like a silent invasion.
meanings.sent5: The severity of trichinoses is often underestimated until it affects someone close to you.
